Text: India Communications Strategyapologise for the delay in sending you the brief that I had promised when we last spokeI was waiting on Sanjay to approve the final draft of the presentation that we were to make to RAC He has been travelling so please consider the enclosure as WIP I will forward the final version as soon as it is ready in the next few days Id like to thank you for your support during the recent interview process and assure you that you can count on me to deliver the results expected of the Communications team I expect to be in Houston in the week of th July and look forward to meeting with you
